title: Desolation Boulevard
description: Desolation Boulevard chronicles the lives of Matt and Sally after an overnight event turns most of the world's population into violent, night-dwelling monsters called "feeders". As the survivors huddle together in this frightening new world, the feeders become stronger and rule the night, threatening the very existence of humanity. As Matt and Sally wage their personal battles in this brutal, ruthless landscape, they meet others who vow to fight and reclaim the world from the evil feeders. When a girl is discovered who may have powers to resist the creatures, the survivors know that they must protect her at all costs. Desolation Boulevard is an action-packed thrill-ride in a bleak, disturbing future where humans are number two in the food chain. Don't start reading this book if you want a good night's sleep!
author: Mark Gordon
